tokens.resolved_gloss: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed

tokens.resolved_gloss: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make a show, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
tokens.translation: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make a show, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to wander away, i.e. lose oneself; by implication to perish (causative, destroy)
tokens.translation: properly, to wander away, i.e. lose oneself; by implication to perish (causative, destroy)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)

tokens.resolved_gloss: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything

tokens.resolved_gloss: a present; specifically (in a good sense), a sacrificial offering, (in a bad sense) a bribe
